title: City of many faces
creator_credit: David Bennett, Lew Parry and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Mountain-fringed, poised on the Pacific, Vancouver is endowed with the natural beauty of flowers, parks and beaches. But even more in the forefront is summer skiing, yachting on the Strait, football at Empire Stadium, plays and concerts at the Queen Elizabeth Theater, and visits to the ever-fascinating zoo in Stanley Park.
